subject: [GAMESNETWORK] ***Digital Public Health Conference 2019 - CfP closing soon!***
body:
>>> 9th INTERNATIONAL DIGITAL HEALTH CONFERENCE #DPH2019 <<<

Official digital health partner of the 12th European Public Health Conference
20th - 23rd November 2019
Marseille Chanot, Palais des Congrs et des Expositions, Marseille, France

EARLY BIRD REGISTRATION NOW OPEN: www.acm-digitalhealth.org

> ABOUT 
The International Digital Public Health Conference series (DPH) is a world leading annual interdisciplinary event on research and innovation in digital health. The event fosters interdisciplinary research and innovation driven by real world needs, aiming to improve public health through the application of novel technology at the personal, community and global levels. Unique in bringing together audiences from Public Health, Computer & Data Science, MedTech industry and NGOs, DPH enables cross-fertilization of research and innovation in digital public health, offering knowledge exchange and networking opportunities.

> AREAS OF INTEREST 
- Technology support of essential public health operations (EPHO)
- Public health interventions and disaster risk reduction (DRR) using mobile technologies
- Serious games and digital storytelling
- Behaviour change
- Citizens science, participatory surveillance and crowdsourcing
- IoT/sensors
- Big data modelling and machine learning
- Data science
- Preparedness and response to emergencies
- Infectious diseases and public health education
- Community engagement
- Infection control and antimicrobial stewardship
- Individual vaccination passports

> CALL FOR PAPERS - MAIN TRACK: DEADLINE 25th MAY 2019
- Long papers (up to 10 pages)
- Short papers (up to 5 pages)
- Posters / Demos

> CALL FOR PAPERS - YOUNG RESEARCHERS FORUM: DEADLINE 25th JUNE 2019 (for publication in ACM proceedings) / 9th JULY otherwise)
Dedicated post-graduate event day co-hosted with ASPHER: Association of Schools of Public Health in the European Region
- Oral presentations 
- Poster / Demo presentations

> CALL FOR APPLICATIONS - DPH 2019 INNOVATION PRIZE: DEADLINE 1st July 2019
Celebrating excellence in partnerships and innovation
